<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name/>=<value> Game
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56</value></part><part><name>Game Version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Menu </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns action stored in item on given path in [[CT_MENU_STRIP]] control. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[menuAction]] [idc, path] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, path]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] - Action </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[menuAction]] path </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name> r2</name>=<value> [[String]] - Action </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>

<comment><!--
|s2= control |Alternative Syntax=
|p21= control: [[Control]] |Alternative Parameter 1=
|p22=  |Alternative Parameter 2=
|p23=  |Alternative Parameter 3=
|r2=  |Alternative Return Value=
-->
</comment></value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value>  <code>[[menuAction]] [120, [1, 0]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value>  <code>[[findDisplay]] 313 [[displayCtrl]] 120 [[menuAction]] [1, 0];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[menuSetAction]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
